  It's 1968 and after years of combat in Vietnam, Lincoln Clay knows this
  truth: family isn't who you're born with, it's who you die for.


  Proper Note:
  ~~~~~~~~~~~~
  So here we are again. Another proper. And by proper we obviously mean
  trolling; harassment.

  Because this is what it has come to be about. Bitter and jaded old men in a
  sick sort of last man standing contest, demanding that they're right, and
  believing that they're in control. That everybody else is wrong and only
  out to sabotage them. Pretending that their ego is so, so big, to cover that
  it's so tiny as to barely be noticeable. Just waiting for the opportunity to
  hawk on someone else. Desperately trying to make the claim that the other
  groups release is shit: they're the true lamers, and liars to boot!

  Maybe their release IS shit? Maybe their crack is in fact a potpourri of
  hacked up and badly written code, "inspired" by those they claim to resent,
  or straight up copied from others. Maybe they ARE indeed dishonest. Making
  up rulesets that nobody agreed to, referencing them only when it suits them.
  Trying to manipulate behind the curtains a concept so laughable as a
  nukenet. Using updated versions of a game to make claims of bad cracks, when
  the updated version was a bugfix. Or maybe they're actual shitheads, their
  skulls literally filled to the brim with feces.

  Or maybe... Oh damn, where was I? Right.

  The CODEX release doesn't work for everybody. On certain systems and setups
  the game just doesn't launch, whereas with our release, it does. No, we're
  not going to help them by pointing out how and why, aka providing "proof" ;)

  The updated v1.01 game is included in our pack, but we make no claim to have
  unlocked FPS, nor that this in itself might fix anything release or crack
  related.
  
  But, to top it all off, we present you with a release that contains a crack
  which features an Arxan-rebuilt exe. Make of that what you will.
  
  And most of all: Enjoy and HAVE FUN! :D

  TEAM RLD 2016

  --

  1. Unrar.
  2. Burn or mount the image.
  3. Install the game. 
  4. Copy over the cracked content from the /Crack directory on the image to
     your game install directory.
  5. Play the game.
  6. Support the software developers. If you like this game, BUY IT!
